text: Chi lixi de ren, yao xiang zhongle mo de ren yiyang, fengfengdiandian de zhan qilai. Zhe shi yinwei tamen shuo:“Maimai jiu xiang lixi.” An la zhunxu maimai, er jinzhi lixi. Feng dao zhu de jiaoxun hou, jiu zunshou jinling de, de yiwang bu jiu, ta de shi gui an la panjue. Zaifan de ren, shi huo yu de jumin, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong
